message.content:
{"id": "112458", "title": "Bug 112458: Property Editor shows properties of layout items when switching to Master page viewer", "description": "Description: When switching to the Master page viewer, the Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items. This can be confusing for customers who may mistake it for the Master Page Editor and inadvertently set properties without clicking on the Master Page viewer first.

Steps to reproduce:
1. [Please specify the steps here.]", "OB": "It is important to fix this issue to prevent confusion for customers. The Property Editor should not display the properties of layout items when in the Master page viewer mode. Instead, it should only show the properties relevant to the Master page.", "EB": "The Property Editor should not display the properties of layout items when in the Master page viewer mode. It should only show the properties relevant to the Master page.", "SR": "1. When switching to the Master page viewer, the Property Editor should not display the properties of layout items.
2. The Property Editor should only show the properties relevant to the Master page."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.

In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
